metadata.description:
THE FIRST OF THE SERIES
works of progress: dangerous 

WHAT IS WORKS OF PROGRESS
we are tapping into our vault of early demos to release a series on sound.xyz... new drop every two weeks

some of these songs may evolve and be released traditionally and some not.. but these early versions will live forever on Sound and we love them.
we will be creating a guild.xyz to integrate with our Discord for our holders of these “Works of Progress”. this will be a place to chime in and offer feedback & ideas, basically crowdsourcing a braintrust of people invested in the vision of the songs and the Beauty School Dropout project.

dangerous was the first song every written by this band so it seems fitting for it to be the first of the series. 

our sonic style has evolved in so many ways since this session, and it’s important to revisit the early work to see where we came from. there is still magic in here.

one thing we’ve come to enjoy is while learning what this band is and how to make music for it, we made many “mistakes” sonically. we wanted to make big rock guitar sounds but had to learn how to do that first. In the tinkering and toying with sounds, sometimes something new would be created.. obstacles make opportunity and that is where the magic lies. 

here is dangerous.. the first of the works of progress series

DANGEROUS

On the beach 
in my red boots
Versace jeans
you got some good moves
Two left feet
I’m so lost in you

Thought it was the last time 
I was gonna see your face
Couldn’t help myself 
With such a bitter taste
You’re probably better off
Without me any ways

You caught me in my
Woah, woah

Dangerous Ways

Take off all your clothes
Show me you’re comfortable
Teach me, teach me 
how to be vulnerable

You lay down on your back
Put my hands into your lap
I know what’s going down
You know we’re about to be something
